_comment: ClawWatch Configuration - Copy to config.json and customize
_docs: All settings have env var equivalents. CLI args > env vars > config.json
_port_note: Server port. Env: CLAWWATCH_PORT or DASHBOARD_PORT. CLI: --port
_sessionPath_note: Path to sessions directory. 'auto' = detect from OpenClaw. Env: CLAWWATCH_SESSION_PATH
_openclawHome_note: OpenClaw base directory. 'auto' = detect via CLI or use ~/.openclaw. Env: OPENCLAW_HOME
_dashboardToken_note: Auth token. Required for 'key', 'login', or 'both' auth modes. Env: CLAWWATCH_TOKEN or DASHBOARD_TOKEN

_authMode_options.none: No authentication required - dashboard is open to anyone
_authMode_options.key: URL key auth only - access via ?key=token, sets cookie for subsequent visits
_authMode_options.login: Login page only - user enters token on login page
_authMode_options.both: Either method works - supports both URL key and login page

_cookieMaxAgeDays_note: How long the auth cookie lasts (for 'key' and 'both' modes). Default: 30 days
_readOnly_note: If true, disables archive/delete operations. Env: DASHBOARD_READ_ONLY. CLI: --read-only
_corsOrigin_note: CORS header. null = same-origin only (recommended), '*' = any origin (dev only)
_updateCheck_note: Automatic update checking. Results are cached for 24 hours.

_updateCheck_options.enabled: true/false - whether to check for updates (default: true)
_updateCheck_options.registryUrl: URL to fetch latest version info (default: ClawHub registry)

_mainAgentName_note: Display name for main agent session. Auto-detected from openclaw.json if not set
_mainAgentEmoji_note: Emoji for main agent. Auto-detected from openclaw.json if not set

agentEmojis._note: Map agent names (lowercase) to emojis. 'default' is fallback.

nodeEmojis._note: Emojis for node types in filter buttons
